DependsOn: Component, Institution Name, Institution Full Name, Institution Alias, Institution Location State, Institution Location City, Rorid

Description: Machine readable name of the institution. (e.g. ArizonaStatUniversity, BostonUniversity, etc.)
Human readable, full name of the institution. (e.g. Arizona State University, Boston University, etc.)
Alias of the institution (e.g. ASU, BU, etc.)
The US state the institution is located in. Use Not Applicable, if not applicable.
Valid Values: Alabama, Alaska, American Samoa, Arizona, Arkansas, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, District of Columbia, Florida, Georgia, Guam, Hawaii, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Minor Outlying Islands, Mississippi, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, North Carolina, North Dakota, Northern Mariana Islands, Not Applicable, Ohio, Oklahoma, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Puerto Rico, Rhode Island, South Carolina, South Dakota, Tennessee, Texas, U.S. Virgin Islands, Utah, Vermont, Virginia, Washington, West Virginia, Wisconsin, Wyoming

Description: The City the institution is located in.
Unique identifier (ROR ID) of an the institution
